data.description: Rimmer and Kryten rescue Camille, a female android from a passenger ship that has crash landed. Kryten falls in love with Camille, only to learn Camille is not who she appears to be, and finds she can shape-shift into Kochanski, a female Rimmer and the Cat.                Written byDaniel Williamson

donation.message: Please, donate to keep this service alive and help its further development
